author: Sabine Hossenfelder
description:
Check out courses in your favorite subjects on Brilliant! Start learning for free at https://brilliant.org/sabine/ and get 20% off a premium subscription, which includes daily unlimited access!

It’s becoming increasingly normal for people to converse with AI chatbots like they would with a human friend. Some people have developed close relationships with AI bots, and think they’ve “awakened” their AI partners into sentience. They have developed an entirely new pseudoscientific theory for this, which is based on five dimensional scalar resonances. Most amazingly, some of these AI prompts have been spread by humans across different platforms, leading to a “natural selection” of AI personas.

title: Beware the New AI Pseudoscience.
